message.content: We refer to Wikipedia articles on medicine for help. The symptoms suggest peripheral neuropathy, which can be confirmed by nerve conduction studies. Transthoracic echocardiography, serum hemoglobin concentration, and serum calcium concentration are not relevant to this presentation.
